sen.j: 桃山南口駅（ももやまみなみぐちえき）は、京都府京都市伏見区にある、京阪電気鉄道京阪宇治線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Momoyama-Minamiguchi Station is a stop on the Keihan Uji Line, which is operated by Keihan Electric Railway.
Momoyama-Minamiguchi Station, located in Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Keihan Uji Line, which is operated by Keihan Electric Railway.
Momoyama-Minamiguchi Station, located in Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Keihan Uji Line, which is operated by Keihan Electric Railway.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 相対式2面2線のプラットホームを持つ地上駅である。
sen.e: It is located on the goround level, with two platforms serving two tracks between them.
It is located on the ground level, with two platforms serving two tracks between them.
It is located on the ground level, with two platforms serving two tracks between them.

sen.j: 改札口は上下線で独立して設けられており、改札内で互いのホームを行き来することはできない(昭和53年頃は構内踏切が有り宇治行きホーム側のみに改札口が有り、朝のみ中書島行きホームへの臨時改札口が設けられていた)。
sen.e: An entrance/exit gate place is provided independently for each of the inbound trains and the outbound trains., and you cannot move between the two platforms inside the entrance/exit gate places (in around 1988, with a railroad crossing provided within the premises, an entrance/exit gate place was provided only on the side of the platform for the trains for Uji and a temporary entrance/exit gate place for the platform for Chushojima was provided only in the morning).

An entrance/exit gate is provided independently for each of the inbound trains and the outbound trains, but one can't move between the two platforms inside the entrance/exit gates (in around 1988, with a railroad crossing provided within the premises, an entrance/exit gate was provided only on the side of the platform for the trains for Uji, and a temporary entrance/exit gate place for the platform for Chushojima was provided only in the morning).

A ticket gate is provided independently for each of the inbound trains and the outbound trains, but one can't move between the two platforms inside the ticket gates (in around 1978, with a railroad crossing provided within the premises, a ticket gate was provided only on the side of the platform for the trains for Uji, and a temporary ticket gate for the platform for Chushojima was provided only in the morning).
sen.cmt: 改札口→ticket gate としました。昭和５３年→1978 に修正しました。

sen.j: 宇治方に改札口があり、宇治方面の改札口に駅員が常駐している（中書島方面の改札口は朝のみ）。
sen.e: Both of the entrance/exit gate places are located on the Uji side, and the one for the trains for Uji is manned all day (the other for Chushojima only in the morning).
Both of the entrance/exit gates are located on the Uji side, and the one for the trains for Uji is manned all day (the other for Chushojima is manned only in the morning).
Both of ticket gates are located on the Uji side, and the one for the trains for Uji is manned all day (the other for Chushojima is manned only in the morning).
sen.cmt: 改札口→ticket gate としました。

sen.j: ※両ホームとも有効長は5両。
sen.e: * Each platform length is that for five-car trains.
* Each platform length is sufficient to accommodate a five-car train.
* Each platform length is sufficient to accommodate a five-car train.

sen.j: 番線表示はない。
sen.e: No track number is displayed.
No track number is displayed.
No track number is displayed.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 伏見桃山陵（明治天皇陵）
sen.e: Fushimi-Momoyama-no-Misasagi (mausoleum) (the mausoleum of Emperor Meiji)
Fushimi-Momoyama-no-Misasagi (mausoleum) (the mausoleum of Emperor Meiji)
Fushimi-Momoyama-no-Misasagi (mausoleum) (the mausoleum of the Emperor Meiji)

sen.j: 京都桃山南口郵便局
sen.e: The Kyoto Momoyama Minamiguchi post office
The Kyoto Momoyama Minamiguchi post office
The Kyoto Momoyama Minamiguchi post office

sen.j: 京都橘中･高等学校
sen.e: Kyoto Tachibana Junior High School and High School
Kyoto Tachibana Junior High School and High School
Kyoto Tachibana Junior High School and High School

sen.j: 洛陽第二幼稚園
sen.e: Rakuyo Daini Kindergarten
Rakuyo Daini Kindergarten
Rakuyo Daini Kindergarten

sen.j: 日蓮正宗・宣照寺
sen.e: Sensho-ji Temple (belonging to Nichiren Shoshu)
Sensho-ji Temple (belonging to Nichiren Shoshu)
Sensho-ji Temple (belonging to Nichiren Shoshu sect)

sen.j: 京都府道7号京都宇治線
sen.e: The Kyoto-Uji road of Kyoto Prefecture road 7
The Kyoto-Uji Road of Kyoto Prefectural Road 7
Kyoto Prefectural Route 7: Kyoto-Uji Line
sen.cmt: 道路表現を変更しました。

sen.j: 1913年（大正2年）6月1日 御陵前駅として開業。
sen.e: June1, 1913: Its operation started as Goryomae Station
June 1, 1913: It went into operation as Goryomae Station.
June 1, 1913: It went into operation as Goryomae Station.

sen.j: 1943年（昭和18年）10月1日 会社合併により京阪神急行電鉄の駅となる。
sen.e: October 1, 1943: The companies concerned merged and this station became a station of Keihanshin-kyuko-dentetsu (Hankyu Corporation).
October 1, 1943: The companies concerned merged, and this station became a facility of Keihanshin-kyuko-dentetsu (Hankyu Corporation).
October 1, 1943: The companies concerned merged, and this station became a facility of Keihanshin Express Electric Railway (Hankyu Corporation).
sen.cmt: 京阪神急行電鉄→Keihanshin Express Electric Railway としました。

sen.j: 1945年（昭和20年）9月15日 輸送混乱防止のため、使用を中止。
sen.e: September 15, 1945, Use of this station was suspended to prevent an occurrence of transportation disruption.
September 15, 1945: The use of this station was suspended to prevent an occurrence of transportation disruption.
September 15, 1945: The use of this station was suspended to prevent an occurrence of transportation disruption.

sen.j: 1946年（昭和21年）2月15日 営業再開。
sen.e: February 15, 1946: Its operation restarted.
February 15, 1946: It became operational again.
February 15, 1946: It became operational again.

sen.j: 1949年（昭和24年）11月25日 桃山南口駅に改称。
sen.e: November 25, 1949: Its name was changed to Momoyama-Minamiguchi Station.
November 25, 1949: Its name was changed to Momoyama-Minamiguchi Station.
November 25, 1949: Its name was changed to Momoyama-Minamiguchi Station.

sen.j: 1949年（昭和24年）12月1日 会社分離により京阪電気鉄道の駅となる。
sen.e: December 1, 1949: Due to a separation of the company, this station became a station of Keihan Electric Railway.
December 1, 1949: Due to a separation of the company, this station became a facility of Keihan Electric Railway.
December 1, 1949: Due to a separation of the company, this station became a facility of Keihan Electric Railway.

sen.j: 1981年（昭和56年）3月 駅舎改築工事竣工
sen.e: March, 1981: The work to reform the station house was completed.
March, 1981: The work of revitalizing the station house was completed.
March, 1981: The work of revitalizing the station house was completed.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 公団桃山団地が近くにあり、また駅周辺も住宅地となっているため利用客は多い。
sen.e: Located near to the public corporation-run Momoyama-danchi housing complexand and other residential areas, this station is used by many people.
This station is used by many people because it's located near to the public corporation-run Momoyama-danchi housing complex and other residential areas.
This station is used by many people because it's located near to the public corporation-run Momoyama-danchi housing complex and other residential areas.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.e: Keihan Electric Railway
Keihan Electric Railway
Keihan Electric Railway

sen.j: 宇治線
sen.e: Uji Line
Uji Line
